preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 6.8 g of erbium using a precision scale. 
 2. Measure 5.2 g of ruthenium using the same scale. 
 3. Measure 3.1 g of zinc. 
 4. Combine all measured materials in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 5. Use a mortar and pestle to thoroughly grind the mixture until it is homogeneous.
